channel.title: Level up and others
channel.description:
alright i want it so that when ppl lvl to 135 they get the skill cape for that lvl... how do i do this and also how do i add an npc for a shop and make it trade and stuff and i might have more questions later so im gonna try keep this thread going
thank u for ur time :)

item.title: Level up and others
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

can someone show me what each number is for each skill and how many there are

Read full topic

item.title: Level up and others
item.dc:creator: @WrittenBlade WrittenBlade
item.description:
@WrittenBlade wrote:

Obtaining a Skill Cape: Search in client.java for the level-up case (case 0:, case 1:, etc.). When you find the message, make a if (playerLevel [number] >= 135), the [number] being the target skill’s case number.

You would add an addItem (item id, item amount); right after the if statement.

As for the shop part, you should know how to use the WanneShop method yourself.

Read full topic
